Module FantasyRealmsTM

Package client

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BigSwitches
    Utility class for getting static data in exchange for other static data
    BoardController
    Controller class for the the board vista.
    Client
    Client thread for listening to server messages and to sending messages to attached server.
    MainController
    Main controller class for the entire layout.
    MainForApplication
    Main controller class for the entering point of the entire layout.
    MenuController
    Menu controller for the menu page of the application.
    Player
    Player holds all the information needed to know about the player.
    RulesController
    Controller class for the Rules page of the application.
    SceneNavigator
    Utility class for controlling navigation between vistas.
    SimplePlayer
    Simplified version of Player class to collect the needed information about other players.
    SimplifiedCard
    SimplifiedCard represents a simplified version of the server counterpart Card.
    Tuple<X,​Y>
    Tuple for holding pairs of whatever Object
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Type
    Enum type with colors from the game to differentiate efficiently between them.
